en: A helmet with parade confidence and please dont bonk me protection.
es: A helmet with parade confidence and please dont bonk me protection.

en: Keeps wax out of your eyes and judgment out of your head.
es: Keeps wax out of your eyes and judgment out of your head.

en: Looks wise. Feels damp. Works anyway.
es: Looks wise. Feels damp. Works anyway.

en: Polished to reflect light and questionable choices.
es: Polished to reflect light and questionable choices.

en: Not bone. Definitely not bone. Dont ask.
es: Not bone. Definitely not bone. Dont ask.

en: For rain, confetti, and surprise hero interviews.
es: For rain, confetti, and surprise hero interviews.

en: They squeak heroically. The dungeon pretends not to notice.
es: They squeak heroically. The dungeon pretends not to notice.

en: Built to outrun regret on wet stone.
es: Built to outrun regret on wet stone.

en: For floors that are 60% ale and 40% confidence.
es: For floors that are 60% ale and 40% confidence.

en: For holding the line. And occasionally, your dignity.
es: For holding the line. And occasionally, your dignity.

en: If you cant hold the torch, become the torch.
es: If you cant hold the torch, become the torch.

en: For when your sword needs a firmer opinion.
es: For when your sword needs a firmer opinion.

en: For striking with honor and pointing at mistakes.
es: For striking with honor and pointing at mistakes.

en: Once you grab the hilt, the promise grabs back.
es: Once you grab the hilt, the promise grabs back.

en: Raises a cup, then raises damage. In that order.
es: Raises a cup, then raises damage. In that order.

en: Sharp enough to cut tension. Barely.
es: Sharp enough to cut tension. Barely.

en: Strikes like a match: quick, bright, mildly concerning.
es: Strikes like a match: quick, bright, mildly concerning.

en: Cuts mist dramatically. Sometimes it even hits enemies.
es: Cuts mist dramatically. Sometimes it even hits enemies.

en: Bows before fights. Doesnt bow during fights.
es: Bows before fights. Doesnt bow during fights.

en: Keeps an honest bite. The edge never lies.
es: Keeps an honest bite. The edge never lies.

en: Not decorative. The ribbon is just optimistic.
es: Not decorative. The ribbon is just optimistic.

en: Soft enough to nap in. Tough enough to pretend you didnt.
es: Soft enough to nap in. Tough enough to pretend you didnt.

en: Smells faintly of campfire and professional responsibility.
es: Smells faintly of campfire and professional responsibility.

en: So shiny enemies can see their mistake coming.
es: So shiny enemies can see their mistake coming.

en: Heavy as a vow. Reliable as one, too.
es: Heavy as a vow. Reliable as one, too.

en: Protects you and insists the victory was planned.
es: Protects you and insists the victory was planned.

en: Round, reliable, and already marked by rookie mistakes.
es: Redondo, confiable y ya marcado por errores de principiante.

en: Blocks strikes and wax drips with the same dedication.
es: Bloquea golpes y goteos de cera con la misma dedicación.

en: Absorbs impacts. Also moisture. Lots of moisture.
es: Absorbe impactos. También humedad. Mucha humedad.

en: Designed for parades. Uncomfortably effective in real combat.
es: Diseñado para desfilar. Incómodamente efectivo en combate real.

en: It doesn't promise to protect you. It just does.
es: No promete protegerte. Simplemente lo hace.

en: Lightweight, loud, and surprisingly hard to get through.
es: Liviano, ruidoso y sorprendentemente difícil de atravesar.
